Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3978 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.7.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-3978 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.7.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress is earlier than 1.7.7-1, affected by CVE-2023-3978
